koohiiStory1: Many men, before they commence their relationship with the woman of their desires, place her on something of a pedestal, which often leads to disappointment later on.
koohiiStory2: If you want to commence a relationship, just put a woman on a pedestal and she´ll love ya forever.
kunYomi: はじ.める、-はじ.める、はじ.まる
myStory: bắt đầu. khởi đầu. người phụ nữ đài loan
readingExamples: 始まる (はじ.まる), 始める (はじ.める)
words: management, dealing, settlement, cleaning up afterwards
beginning and end, from beginning to end, doing a thing from beginning to end
How do you do?, I am glad to meet you
in the beginning, to begin with, first of all
